mapper.sql: id, date_created, date_updated, discovery_id, handler, listener_node, props
mapper.select: SELECT true FROM discovery_handler WHERE id = #{id} limit 1

SELECT dh.id, dh.date_created, dh.date_updated, dh.discovery_id, dh.handler, dh.listener_node FROM discovery_handler dh inner join discovery_rel dr on dh.id = dr.discovery_handler_id WHERE dr.proxy_selector_id = #{proxySelectorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT dh.id, dh.date_created, dh.date_updated, dh.discovery_id, dh.handler, dh.listener_node FROM discovery_handler dh inner join discovery_rel dr on dh.id = dr.discovery_handler_id WHERE dr.selector_id = #{selectorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO discovery_handler (id, date_created, date_updated, discovery_id, handler, listener_node, props) VALUES (#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateCreated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateUpdated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{discoveryId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handler, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{listenerNode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{props, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

INSERT INTO discovery_handler
id,
date_created,
date_updated,
discovery_id,
handler,
listener_node,
props,
#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dateCreated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{dateUpdated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{discoveryId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handler, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{listenerNode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{props, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update: UPDATE discovery_handler SET date_created = #{dateCreated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, date_updated = #{dateUpdated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, discovery_id = #{discoveryId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handler = #{handler, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, listener_node = #{listenerNode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, props = #{props, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE discovery_handler
date_created = #{dateCreated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
date_updated = #{dateUpdated, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
discovery_id = #{discoveryId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handler = #{handler, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
listener_node = #{listenerNode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
props = #{props, jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
